name: タイトファンタジー2
summary:
The long-awaited release of the animated masterpiece Tight Fantasy 2 is finally here! This new 3DX movie is the sequel to one of 2020 most popular porn parodies, Tight Fantasy, and it is as awesome as expected. Just when we thought it couldn’t get any better, Amusteven has returned and proven his overwhelming animation prowess once again. If you are fan of the first episode, then you’ll definitely want to watch Tight Fantasy 2! To say that this product is one of the greatest 3DX works you’ve ever seen is truly the understatement of the century! There will also be an alternate version coming to the store a few weeks later featuring a different ending, tan lines, pubic hair and even more revealing outfit, so stay tuned for it as well!
This episode starts with a rather light and cheerful notes, for Tiff’s boyfriend Claude is finally back! Unfortunately for our cum-hungry childhood crush, this reunion is a bit…disappointing to say the least. But fear not, for Barry is here once again to help her. They start out with just a handjob and some sloppy BJ, as Tiff does not to wake her boo up. But her horniness is too strong to ignore and after just a few words of prompting from Barry, she is ready to hop on his cock. Our muscle-bound hunk has her ride him reverse-cowgirl style, and then bend her over the table. All of that is just a few feet away from where Claude is sleeping. With all the cumming and moaning next to him, will Claude wake up and catch them? Or will he miss it all once again and be stuck in cuckdom forever?
Tight Fantasy 2 is as perfect as 3DX porn parodies go. Featuring motion capture animations without short loops, 3 cumshots, and over 200 hundred lines of dialogue voiced by talented VAs such as Marie Fasolt, FatBoiiPanda and Neptune, you are in for a real treat. You can even watch it in your preferred language, as the movie has external subtitles in English, Spanish and French. What more, this 22-minute-long masterpiece only costs $21.00 apiece! Considering the amazing works Amusteven and the crews have put into it, it is basically a giveaway. So head over to the Affect3D Store, grab a copy, and watch Tight Fantasy 2 today!
